Software Engineering.title: Personal Portfolio Website
Software Engineering.description: Build a professional portfolio with projects, skills, and resume. Learn responsive design and deploy to GitHub Pages or Netlify.

Software Engineering.title: Todo List with Authentication
Software Engineering.description: Build a full-stack todo app with user auth, CRUD operations, and JWT token management. Deploy to Heroku or Railway.

Software Engineering.title: E-commerce Platform
Software Engineering.description: Build an e-commerce store with product listings, cart, checkout, and Stripe payment integration.

Software Engineering.title: REST API for Blog Platform
Software Engineering.description: Build a RESTful API with endpoints for posts, comments, and users. Add auth, validation, and Swagger documentation.

Software Engineering.title: Real-time Chat Application
Software Engineering.description: Create a real-time messaging app with chat rooms, direct messages, typing indicators, and file sharing.

Software Engineering.title: Task Management System (Trello Clone)
Software Engineering.description: Build a Trello-style board with drag-and-drop tasks, real-time collaboration, and team workspaces.

Software Engineering.title: API Gateway & Authentication Service
Software Engineering.description: Build a secure API gateway with authentication, authorization, rate limiting, and OAuth 2.0 support.

Software Engineering.title: Microservices Architecture with Docker & Kubernetes
Software Engineering.description: Deploy a production-grade microservices system with service discovery, load balancing, and distributed tracing.

Backend Engineering.title: Todo List with Authentication
Backend Engineering.description: Build a full-stack todo app with user auth, CRUD operations, and JWT token management. Deploy to Heroku or Railway.

Backend Engineering.title: Microservices Architecture with Docker & Kubernetes
Backend Engineering.description: Deploy a production-grade microservices system with service discovery, load balancing, and distributed tracing.

Frontend Engineering.description: Build a professional portfolio with projects, skills, and resume. Learn responsive design and deploy to GitHub Pages or Netlify.

Frontend Engineering.title: Todo List with Authentication
Frontend Engineering.description: Build a full-stack todo app with user auth, CRUD operations, and JWT token management. Deploy to Heroku or Railway.

Frontend Engineering.title: E-commerce Platform
Frontend Engineering.description: Build an e-commerce store with product listings, cart, checkout, and Stripe payment integration.

Frontend Engineering.title: Real-time Chat Application
Frontend Engineering.description: Create a real-time messaging app with chat rooms, direct messages, typing indicators, and file sharing.

Data Science.title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) Project
Data Science.description: Perform EDA on a real-world dataset. Learn data cleaning, visualization, and statistical analysis.

Data Science.title: Customer Segmentation with K-Means
Data Science.description: Analyze customer purchase data using K-Means clustering. Apply RFM analysis for marketing strategies.

Data Science.title: House Price Prediction Model
Data Science.description: Build a regression model to predict house prices using feature engineering and model evaluation.

Data Science.title: Customer Churn Prediction
Data Science.description: Build a classification model to predict customer churn. Handle imbalanced data with SMOTE and interpret with SHAP.

Data Science.title: Sales Forecasting with Time Series
Data Science.description: Build a time series model to predict future sales using ARIMA, SARIMA, or Prophet. Account for seasonality and trends.

Data Science.title: Recommender System (Netflix-style)
Data Science.description: Build a movie recommendation system using collaborative filtering and content-based approaches.

Data Science.title: Image Classification with CNNs
Data Science.description: Develop a CNN image classifier using transfer learning. Deploy as a REST API on AWS or Google Cloud.

Data Science.title: NLP Sentiment Analysis System
Data Science.description: Build a sentiment analysis system using BERT or GPT models. Create a web interface with FastAPI.

Data Analytics.title: Sales Dashboard in Excel
Data Analytics.description: Build an interactive sales dashboard using pivot tables, VLOOKUP, and charts. Track revenue and performance metrics.

Data Analytics.title: SQL Data Analysis Project
Data Analytics.description: Analyze e-commerce database to answer business questions. Practice JOINs, window functions, and CTEs.

Data Analytics.title: Power BI/Tableau Dashboard
Data Analytics.description: Create an interactive BI dashboard for a retail company showing sales trends, demographics, and performance.

Data Analytics.title: Customer Cohort Analysis
Data Analytics.description: Perform cohort analysis on customer data to understand retention and lifetime value patterns.

Data Analytics.title: A/B Testing Analysis Framework
Data Analytics.description: Design and analyze A/B tests. Calculate statistical significance, confidence intervals, and sample sizes.

Data Analytics.title: Marketing Attribution Model
Data Analytics.description: Build a multi-touch attribution model to analyze customer journeys and optimize marketing spend.

Data Analytics.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
Data Analytics.description: Build a real-time analytics pipeline using Kafka, Spark Streaming, and Redis. Visualize live dashboards.

Machine Learning.title: Customer Segmentation with K-Means
Machine Learning.description: Analyze customer purchase data using K-Means clustering. Apply RFM analysis for marketing strategies.

Machine Learning.title: House Price Prediction Model
Machine Learning.description: Build a regression model to predict house prices using feature engineering and model evaluation.

Machine Learning.title: Customer Churn Prediction
Machine Learning.description: Build a classification model to predict customer churn. Handle imbalanced data with SMOTE and interpret with SHAP.

Machine Learning.title: Recommender System (Netflix-style)
Machine Learning.description: Build a movie recommendation system using collaborative filtering and content-based approaches.

Machine Learning.title: Image Classification with CNNs
Machine Learning.description: Develop a CNN image classifier using transfer learning. Deploy as a REST API on AWS or Google Cloud.

Machine Learning.title: NLP Sentiment Analysis System
Machine Learning.description: Build a sentiment analysis system using BERT or GPT models. Create a web interface with FastAPI.

Machine Learning.title: AI-Powered Content Moderation System
Machine Learning.description: Build a multi-modal moderation system using vision and NLP models. Include human-in-the-loop review.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Dockerize a Web Application
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Learn containerization by Dockerizing a web application. Create Dockerfiles and use docker-compose.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Automated Deployment with GitHub Actions
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions to automatically test, build, and deploy applications.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Infrastructure as Code with Terraform
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Automate AWS infrastructure provisioning using Terraform. Create EC2, VPC, S3, and RDS resources.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Monitoring & Logging Stack
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Build an observability stack with Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK. Set up alerts and custom dashboards.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Complete CI/CD Pipeline with Jenkins
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Build an end-to-end CI/CD pipeline with testing, Docker builds, security scanning, and Kubernetes deployment.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Kubernetes Deployment & Management
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Deploy and manage applications on Kubernetes. Learn pods, services, deployments, and auto-scaling.

DevOps & Cloud Computing.title: Multi-Cloud Infrastructure with Terraform
DevOps & Cloud Computing.description: Design a production-grade multi-cloud infrastructure. Implement disaster recovery and high availability.
